c74object.name: vmtof~
c74object.description:
vmtof~ provides a CPU efficient version of mtof~ using SIMD operations.
Use vmtof~ to convert MIDI note numbers to frequency at signal rate

method.name: signal
method.digest: Convert MIDI note number to frequency
method.description: Outputs the frequency corresponding to the input MIDI note number

entry.name: signal
entry.description: The frequency corresponding to the input MIDI note number as a signal.
